Uses of Class
org.activebpel.rt.bpel.impl.AeBpelException

Packages that use AeBpelException
org.activebpel.rt.bpel This package contains classes for creating a BPEL model and for implements a standalone BPEL engine for testing designs. 
org.activebpel.rt.bpel.def This package contains base classes and elements used to create BPEL model definitions. 
org.activebpel.rt.bpel.ext.expr.bsf.impl This package contains classes which support running expressions using the BSF (Bean Scripting Framework). 
org.activebpel.rt.bpel.ext.expr.impl.javascript This package contains classes which support running expressions written in JavaScript.  
org.activebpel.rt.bpel.ext.expr.impl.xquery This package contains classes which support running expressions written in XQuery.  
org.activebpel.rt.bpel.impl This package contains the base classes used in the implementation model for the BPEL activities. 
org.activebpel.rt.bpel.impl.activity This package contains classes used in the implementation model for the BPEL activities. 
org.activebpel.rt.bpel.impl.activity.assign This package contains implementation objects used for executing the assign activity. 
org.activebpel.rt.bpel.impl.activity.assign.copy This package contains implementation classes used when executing the Copy operations in an assign activity. 
org.activebpel.rt.bpel.impl.activity.assign.from This package contains implementation classes used when executing the 'from' portion of an assign activity's copy operation. 
org.activebpel.rt.bpel.impl.activity.assign.to This package contains implementation classes used when executing the 'to' portion of an assign activity's copy operation. 
org.activebpel.rt.bpel.impl.activity.support Includes supporting bpel objects which aren't properly activities.  
org.activebpel.rt.bpel.impl.activity.wsio   
org.activebpel.rt.bpel.impl.expr This package contains classes which support running expressions. 
org.activebpel.rt.bpel.impl.expr.xpath This package contains classes which support running expressions written in XPath This implementation uses the Jaxen library in order to run expressions written in the XPath language. 
org.activebpel.rt.bpel.impl.function   
org.activebpel.rt.bpel.xpath
